title: Which song are you listening to recently? - Quora

response.answer_text: Misery by Maroon 5. I know this is old.Heard it recently so I have really have started humming it every now and then. Give it a try. It has got a nice catchy and peppy tune to it. :D

La La La (Naughty Boy song) by Naughty Boy ft. Sam Smith (singer) Its been an year since the song has been out. I found it by chance while browsing through youtube. The song has a catchy beat but what i loved even more was the music video (a mixture of wizard of oz and the tale of el tio, which is part of the bolivian folklore).
